short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds a copy button to every answer that ChatGPT gives you.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: All your work on ChatGPT can be messy and have lengthy answers. Its hard to select the text from start to end for a particular answer and then copy it. This plugin gives you power for click a button and copy the answer. For every answer, it will place a copy icon nicely next to the like/dislike icons at the top.
